head.supplied: ¶ [We have valuable Letters from many honored correspondents, …, Baron Von ¶ Mueller ¶ , Director of Botanic Gardens, Melbourne, and many other kind friends, these all shall have especlal care immed...

div.p: To the California Farmer and Journal of Useful Sciences

Letter not found. The text given here is from California farmer and journal of useful sciences, 23 July 1874, p. 60. It is dated to early June 1874 as the latest likely date that it could have been sent to have been noted in this issue of the weekly newspaper.
[We have valuable Letters from many honored correspondents, …, Baron Von Mueller, Director of Botanic Gardens, Melbourne, and many other kind friends, these all shall have especlal care immediately.]
